article.content: Help get the word out about the joint GCC2018 & BOSC 2018 conference. [](https://depot.galaxyproject.org/hub/attachments/events/gccbosc2018/gccbosc2018-flyer.pdf) # Flyer * Help get the word out by distributing / posting the conference [flyer](https://depot.galaxyproject.org/hub/attachments/events/gccbosc2018/gccbosc2018-flyer.pdf) # Conference Graphics ## Logo In [Big (6360 x 6360)](/src/images/logos/gcc-bosc-2018-logo-big.png), [Medium (800 x 800)](/src/images/logos/gcc-bosc-2018-logo-800.png), and [Small (300 x 300)](/src/images/logos/gcc-bosc-2018-logo-300.png) sizes: [](/src/images/logos/gcc-bosc-2018-logo-big.png) [](/src/images/logos/gcc-bosc-2018-logo-800.png) [](/src/images/logos/gcc-bosc-2018-logo-300.png) ## Banner In one size fits all size: [](/src/images/logos/gcc-bosc-2018-banner.png) ## Project Logos * BOSC: [Github](https://github.com/OBF/bosc_materials/tree/master/logos), [Wiki](https://www.open-bio.org/wiki/Category:OBF_Logos) * [Galaxy](/src/images/galaxy-logos/index.md) # Slides Giving a presentation? Include a slide or two about the conference. * [PowerPoint](https://depot.galaxyproject.org/hub/attachments/documents/presentations/gccbosc2018-slides.pptx) * [PDF](https://depot.galaxyproject.org/hub/attachments/documents/presentations/gccbosc2018-slides.pdf)
